page.title: DeadAir Evolution T Files
page.t: Changes whether the Evolution script will continue to run. Disabling does not revert ships already upgraded.

Changes the time \(in minutes\) between evolution level increases. Has no effect if DA Evolution disabled or already at max level. First iteration will only occur after 4 hours of the mod being enabled on save. Default = 120 minutes
DA Evolution Current Level / Max Level
Shows the current progress level of DA Evolution.
Changes whether additional ships are built by xenon.
Changes the maximum number of Xenon fleets that will be ordered built by Xenon from this mod. Default = 10 fleets
Size of the Xenon fleets added by DA Evolution. This will only affect future fleets built. Default = Medium
